channel.title: ambition on babble
channel.description: Recent content in ambition on babble

item.title: 005 - Making Friends
item.description: I’ve always had friends, but I’ve never put much effort into making friends. Ah, ok, that’s already not true. In eighth grade I decided for some deranged reason that only makes sense in the mind of a teenager that I wanted to be popular. And so I started putting a lot of effort into becoming friends with the popular kids. I’m not even sure at this point how I bootstrapped that endeavor.
